Summary: I was flying home on my rocket pack when i was just over my house on park ave landing on my balcony i noticed out of the corner of my eye a cigar shaped object i could only see half of the object it appeared to be burning from the tip lit like a cherry
divs: Sighting Detailsthis cigar shaped object was at about 4 inches from my eyes appeared to be so large i could smell this weird stench and my eyes were tearing from what i thought was smoke going in my eyes it smelled like a strawberry philly i felt a physic connection with this ufo i thought this is bullshit and it made me feel happy and very hungry almost as if i had the munchies i pulled out some potato chips during the event and ate them all they didnt fill me up so i strapped my rocketpack on and shot off to the neerest wawa to retrieve a chilly cheese dog and a bag of combos before i realized i forgot all about the ufo so i flew home to call my friend tom what a night
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around September 22nd 2007
